name: City-8
description:
City-8

Description: 

An 8-bit City Building Simulator based off Sim City 2000 made in Pico-8.

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move Cursor

Press C to pick menu options + place buildings

Press V to open/close the building menu

How to play:

In City-8 there are many factors to keeping your city healthy and happy:

  • Cash: Earned through tax on population
  • Population/Housing: The amount of people is limited by the amount of houses
  • Happyiness: Keep employment with shops and factories and health high with hospitals/ traffic low with roads
